website_summaries.verdict: A little longer than other kids sleeping bags, but still a manageable size.
pros: Can be zipped together with another bag
Comes with a bag for storage
cons: This bag is not flame retardant

customer_reviews.title: What a great sleeping bag for the price seems to be decent ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great sleeping bag for the price seems to be decent quality, it is much longer than expected, folds up nice and small for storage or packing. Great sleeping bag for the price! I have purchased kiddie sleeping bags for a higher price than these that are cheaper quality and half the size!
customer_reviews.author: tel

customer_reviews.title: As Discribed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for my son's away camp week. It was light weight and the perfect shade of blue which was actually a little darker than advertised. The sleeping bag was easily put into the carry bag without rolling and I was able to make it compact to a size smaller than a roll of paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: JSwygert

customer_reviews.title: exchange was easy..
customer_reviews.text: color is vibrant...returned the first one I ordered because the colors were not true to the picture...exchange was easy...revalCamp was quick to help out..highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fly fisher woman

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, tiny and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for myself. Used it during a cub scout camp out where it got down to about 40 degrees. I was very comfortable with both the temperature and texture of the sleeping bag. It folds down very small and is super lightweight. I love the straps on the outside of the carry bag as it helps to make the bag even smaller and can be adjusted to the size and shape you need it to be. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyMom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 11 of these for my son's Super Mario themed birthday celebration and the kids loved them! They were comfy and the little bags they come with are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Performs as Described
customer_reviews.text: So far the sleeping bag has been great and exactly as described in the product description. Lining both inside and out is durable. I have used the bag in temperatures in the mid 40's so far and I stayed nice and warm. The size is great, I can put it in it's bag and sinch the straps and then put it into my backpack which was my goal. Seller has been great, product arrived early, and so far the product has lived up to it's billing. Satisfied customer here. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... bag is apparently reversible which I guess is a good thing, but it also means that the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is apparently reversible which I guess is a good thing, but it also means that the inside layer is always the same slick material (rather than a lining fabric) which is uncomfortable to sleep on unless you are completely clothed.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Light bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son - he loved it. Fun colors and lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K. Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for the price - wish it compressed a little more, but a fine trade off for the savings...
customer_reviews.text: Well-made warm weather bag. Doesn't compress into as small a package as some other similar bags, but I'm OK giving up a little to save a few bucks for a bag that has stood up to teenagers and younger kids using it...
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zimbabwe

customer_reviews.title: My 3 kids really like the bags
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids really like the bags. They pack up super tight, take less room than our other bags. As shown, small compared to our TV remote. Trick is to fold bag and start rolling from end of bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Slumber parties only! Not good for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Stayed freezing throughout the night at 40 degrees. Returned it! Plus, the zipper broke in the first night of using it, making the second night, even colder.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I washed it on delicate cycle with cold water & it already has the matting inside separating in places
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Super thin and flimsy. Washed it once and the batting balled up. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 yr old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr daughter took this with her on our overnight hike in the mountains. The temp dropped down to 42 degrees and she only had shorts and a tee shirt on and she said she stayed warm. We slept in my hiking tent (Zpack Duplex) which kept us out of the wind and rain. Yes, it rained all night. I'm going to purchase another sleeping bag for my other daughter as these are great sleeping bags for the price and weight. I think this sleeping bag temp rating could be about 35-40 degrees F pending on the child and their comfort level, clothes they are wearing to bed, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this sleeping bag. It is extremely thin. NO "cushiony" support. it was a if i was just spreading a sheet on the ground. was not impressed with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but lumpy after one wash.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is very compact and great for summer camping. My son used it for a week at scout camp. After a week of hot sticky weather it was a little ripe, so I washed it (on gentle). After one wash, the internal material has now bunched up in places. Still usuable, and my son doesn’t care, but it would make me a little crazy to sleep on it like this. Given the price point, I can’t really complain though.
customer_reviews.author: Aeneas

customer_reviews.title: Low quality sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware! This sleeping bag is very poor quality. The fabric is very thin. It came with strings all hanging off of it. It must be washed on gentle cycle. Even still it comes out with the filling all bunched up. You cannot dry it in the dryer. It is impossible to get it into that tiny bag they give. Do yourself a favor and don’t buy this. I regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LVarner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m super disappointed with the tiny bag that the sleeping bag will not fit into no matter how hard I have tried. A sleeping bag without an appropriate carry bag is useless to me because this means I cannot store it or travel with it well. I bought three of these and now I have to figure out how to return to buy something with a better quality carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price, though flawed
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used this bag recently for the West Coast Trail where night-time temps ranged from 39-45. I have about 6-7 other bags (-10F - 50F ) and typically find that the temperature ratings are reasonable, however this bag should not be rated below 45F (rectangular option) because there isn't a draft collar or way to cinch down the top so a lot of heat escapes. The bag did well in damp conditions and at 2 pounds and $30, the price to weight ratio is descent though. Anyone saying the rectangular and hooded versions are the exact same weight are high.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap lightweight sleeping bags - but they fall apart within first use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these for kids sleep overs, and within the first use they were all falling apart. They're cheap and lightweight but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: PTM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but heavier than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product - it appears to be good quality, but the weight is (per the packaging) 2.34 pounds, not 2. False advertising really grinds my gears, so I would drop this to 3 stars, but 1) the actual material is higher quality than I expected and 2) I paid just over $17 for it with a lightning deal Manufacturer, please correct your product information to reflect the actual weight of you product. Clearly you know it weighs more than is currently advertised. PS. I care about the weight because this is for backpacking
customer_reviews.author: Monty J. Buhrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, compact ... and a little slippery
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I go to an annual beach weekend where there are beds but no linens. Sleeping bags are easier than hauling bedding, and my kids think sleeping bags are way more fun, anyway. These were perfectly comfortable in an unheated building during cool (40-50 degree) nights, and I love how compact they are after stuffing them into their bags. The only minor downside is that they're pretty slippery for wiggly sleepers. I had no trouble, but my 4-year-old nearly lost his over the side of the bed a few times each night. The bag slithered off as he rolled and resituated. Otherwise, we were all happy!
customer_reviews.author: Library Chick

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag for slumber parties
customer_reviews.text: This is the second sleeping bag like this I ordered. The orange is bright and my son loves the color. (I ordered a fuchsia colored one about a year ago for my daughter. We had nice warm bags, but for slumber parties they were so bulky and there was no need for the kids to need such warm bags for indoors. This one is small enough that my kids can take it to school if they need to go to a friends house afterwards. I assume it would be warm enough for a warm summer evening outside, but we haven't tested it for that.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I ordered which was made easier by all of the answered questions and reviews.
customer_reviews.text: It took a longer than I expected but I was kept posted and it arrived well before Christmas. In shopping, I had narrowed it down to two sleeping bags intended for a nine year old camping with family or in the backyard. Through product details and reviews I found that it's good for summer and down to 56 degrees. I checked the runner up and it was good to 32 degree rating. We live in Texas and summer nights range 80-100. This is a light mummy bag with a built in pillow. Her brother loves his.
customer_reviews.author: kay pope

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Sleeping Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric! I haven’t actually slept in it yet, but I tried it out in the floor. Very comfortable! Since I have 2 guest children sometimes and also wanted to be sure there was room for me and my dog to sleep inside, I bought a second one. The second came today and I zipped them together. Talk about comfortable!! Add an air mattress to the floor and we’re talking instant bed!! Then I rolled each one up tightly and it fit into that little bag! Easy to store in my closet. I’m very happy with these sleeping bags!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Carter

customer_reviews.title: Deep rich color, lightweight compact sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 9yr old. The purple color is great. Just as shown, rich, full color. The bag is very lightweight and squishes down into the small carry bag. My only concern is with the outer material. It feels like it could easily rip or tear. We have only had it open for 3 days and it has been used during the day and a couple nights just out of excitement at having a new sleeping bag :) and so far no major issues. Oh it did have a slight odor to it upon opening, but after having it open on the floor for a 2-3hrs the smell was gone. Overall I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mamato3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling when paired with the KingCamp Ultralight Compact Folding Camping Cot Bed. As I said in my review of the cot, these fit together into a small duffle which works great for traveling with my son. The stuff sack is a good size and as advertised, it packs down really small. (The cinch straps are a nice touch, too.) The red is a nice, rich color. We've only used it inside, so I can't vouch for how warm it is under camping conditions, but it's great as the extra bed in a hotel room or when going to the grandparents' house.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Mccollum

customer_reviews.title: Revalcamp Sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: 2020 update. Purchasing was a mistake. After only 1 yr. of occasional use at grandmas the filling has totally shifted resulting in nylon on nylon in most of the bag. Zipper works fine & nylon shell seems good enough quality, but batting is nonnexistant it seems. I purchased several other bags (13 to be exact) & this one was a dufferent kind due to child LOVING color orange. Not happy with this one at all.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fielding

customer_reviews.title: That zipper has issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size and low cost for these. My wife and I were planning to use these doubled up. They seem like the fit could be much better. For example, the zippers work fine independantly. Doubling them up is quite a chore because the zippers seem to be slightly different in size so when one bag zips to the other, the zippers skip a tooth about evert 3-4 inches. Once they are doubled and zipped all the way there is a 4 inch difference between the two and the velcro does not line up. I am worried about the integrity of the zipper down the road.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Light weight bag.  BROKEN storage bag.  See photos ☹️
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a great lightweight sleeping bag for my trekking adventure in Nepal. However, I am very disappointed that the bag that the sleeping bag goes into came with two broken clips. I am hoping that REVALCAMP will see ithis review, and send me a new bag. I really don’t want to go to the hassle of returning the entire sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these light weight sleeping bags on top of my bunk beds and it works really well! Keeps me from having to change the sheets every time the kids sleep over. I just wash the sleeping bag and don't have to fight with trying to get sheets and blankets on bunk beds! The kids love them and they are just right for all seasons. They can snuggle down inside them all zipped up or they can open them up and use them as a blanket. I just put a bottom sheet on the beds and roll up the sleeping bags at the end of the bed. Saw this trick in a women's magazine!!
customer_reviews.author: DrPepper1330

customer_reviews.title: Not quite it.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: 1) After washing in the washing machine on cold fit the first time (it arrived with a slight smell), some of the filling material bunched up and I can't flatten it. 2) It's not dryer safe so you need to have space to air dry. 3) It's too slim for me to sleep in (5'7" 140lbs). Pros: 1) Is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F90

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE their sleeping bags!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased 2 of these sleeping bags for my kids (ages 6 & 4) for our upcoming camping trip. My daughter fell in love right away! She's been sleeping in her bag in her room at home for the last 2 nights. Fantastic sleeping bags for kids. They fit easily into the stuff sack & the colors are vibrant. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peachie

customer_reviews.title: Great price, love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: We aren't serious campers, but we wanted to do something different for the summer. We bought two of these sleeping bags for our backyard campsite because of the reviews and the price. They're perfect. They don't take up much space and the storage bag even has straps for being used as a backpack. The storage bag also has a little tag on it to indicate the color of the bag inside, so I like the attention to little details! The outside material wipes clean easily and say they are machine washable, but I haven't washed them yet. They weren't too hot when we went to sleep and were the perfect layer when the temps got lower at night.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Baird

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: I know the description says “light weight” but I thought for the price of this sleeping back, it would’ve been a little higher quality. It is very light weight. My daughter said she was freezing in 65 degree weather with this sleeping bag. Doesn’t do much even on a summer night. Probably good for sleeping inside but didn’t do much while tent camping. Sent one back because it wasn’t opened and kept the second one only because it was used for a night. Steep price for this.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Willson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Comfy Sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: We camped for a week in PA last week and I bought this sleeping bag in purple for my daughter. It surprised me how small the bag is that it comes in! The sleeping bag is very soft, almost a slinky type of feeling. It is very lightweight and easy for her to carry. I wasn't sure if it would keep her warm, as the nights got down to the low 50s but she was very comfortable and warm! The purple color is really beautiful and vibrant and it's her favorite so win-win:) We're going camping again in late October so we'll give it another test in colder weather. For now, I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Chitownmama

customer_reviews.title: Camp overs Done Right!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a green bag for Jack (because green is his fav color) AND a blue bag for Hank because blue IS the only color. We call them “summer bags” for Summer Sleepovers at G’ma & G’pa’s house. The sleeping bags are the silkiest, softest bedding we have used so far. The boys snuggle down in them (after at least 3 bedtime stories & a couple of drinks). Finally they are fast asleep. Next morning they handle the roll-up themselves because that’s what real campers do! They are 5 STAR grandsons too!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Kay Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not For Adults
customer_reviews.text: This is a very inexpensive sleeping bag with a great variety of colors. I needed a quick purchase for a trip to a mountain cabin, and my NorthFace Down Bag had a broken zipper. I thought I'd give this a try. You do get what you pay for. I'm an adult woman, 5ft. 4in. , 105 lbs., and the bag was way too small for me. It's really light weight, providing no warmth even in relatively warm summer mountain conditions. We also bought one for my four year old grandson, and it was okay. It will be fine for spreading on lawn for picnics.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Ann

customer_reviews.title: Absolute JUNK!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off these bags are about the thickness of tissue paper!!! But the reason I returned them is because the zippers are garbage and do not work in the least!!!! Do your self a favor and don't order this junk!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JTWJR

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Not very warm, not waterproof/resistant, not very durable Great for a cheap summer sack for the kids camping and that’s about it
customer_reviews.author: BTR

customer_reviews.title: It's a basic sleeping bag - no more ... no less
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic sleeping bag. MUCH thinner than expected but we bought it for use in our Travel Trailer so temps aren't an issue. I wouldn't recommend it for tent camping unless you're camping in moderate temps. For our use and the price (under $20), it meets our needs.
customer_reviews.author: R H Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeping bag but carrying bag is too small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my kids and they like how comfortable they are.My only dislikes, which kept me from giving them five stars, is they don’t have Velcro straps which make it a lot easier to secure when rolled up.And this may seem petty, but my wife or I have to put them back into the carrying bags which need to be a bit bigger.The last sleeping bags the kids had they could easily roll and bag them themselves which was nice, especially when staying at a friends house.
customer_reviews.author: JSB12

customer_reviews.title: Too light for real camping
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Packs up small. Nice color options. Dislikes: Too light for outdoor summer camping. Conclusion: This is a good bag for sleepovers but way too light for camping, even in the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: MikeM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sleeping Bag!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was flying out to help the hurricane victims. She needed a lightweight sleeping bag. REVALCAMP was the answer. She loved the ones with the images. It packed easily for her to carry onto the plane and without being too bulky or heavy. The company sent updates and tips as how to best care for the sleeping bag. Most importantly, they explained how to pack the bag as well. Really pleased with their product and would buy from again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: More of a casual summer camping sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for backpacking because its small(ish) and cheap. I left it with a friend, though, because its actually rather heavy and not as compact as you'd imagine. If you're looking for something compact for backpacking with a very light pack I think its work spending the money on a good one. Especially if you will be in cold climates. This is more of a warm climate sleeping bag. If this is a weekend trip with the kids kind of purchase then I'd say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I hope you're skinny and narrow and don't use it under 50°.I had to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight but I hope your not looking for room to move inside it cuz it's narrow. I'm 5'11" and I weigh 235lbs but the widest part of my body is my chest and shoulders. It only zipped up to my mid ribcage. Just FYI. I had to spend $75 on a 0° XXL from Teton sports for a 3week campout in upstate N.Y.for this November.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, compact sleeping bag, and an absolute steal for the price! It compresses just about as much as my husband's much more expensive backpacking sleeping bag. It is rated just about perfectly too, it will keep you warm down to 40 degrees. I went camping in the Grand Tetons w/ this bag and the first night was right around 40 degrees and I was perfectly toasty. The second night dropped below 40 degrees and I was a little cold, so just pay attention to the rating and you should be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and warm
customer_reviews.text: bought this for grandkids to use indoors sleeping in living room at Christmas. they loved the color selections (bought 2; each in favorite colors). they are lightweight, easy to pack up in small bag provided and warm. The only thing I did not like about them is how slippery they were and hard to keep on them. But this is typical of the lightweight gear and apparel popular today. Great item for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Grandma's camp ground
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have 19 grandchildren all together, but we usually only have 5 or 6 of them stay all night at one time. My mother (Great G Ma) came to visit and she suggested sleeping bags and so I was on a mission to get 6 of them in different colors. These are perfect, they are young kids now but will grow into them and so much easier than an air mattress, I had no worries about anyone falling out of the bed. And the best thing is that they loved them too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor zipper quality
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke on the 2nd day of use. I purchased three of these sleeping bags for use while backpacking in warmer climates. They are light, pack small, and provide just enough warmth with outside temperatures in the 50's. Two of the bags performed as advertised. The third bag's zipper fell off on the second night. I survived the trip, even without a functioning bag, but I am annoyed. Additionally, this bag was barely long enough for a 5'11 individual. I wasn't expecting to get a top-notch product at this price, but I did expect it to last the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product for a hot summer night!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was going on her first camp week and it was promising to be a hot one. I could not bear to think of her in her cabin sweating to death with her sleeping bag then I found REVAL CAMP Ultralight Sleeping Bag and that was PERFECT! She didn't want to put it away when we got it... she and the cats rolled around in it for a couple of days before she went to camp.
customer_reviews.author: Claire W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and compact
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter, aged 8. I know she’s used it a couple of times and slept well. I just wish the bag were just a bit larger because at that age it’s hard to stuff it in there. I could do it, but it would be nice if she could do it on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Duttlinger

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for me, one for my wife. Used them in our tent (1st time) when temps got to about 50. Quite comfortable. Only "problem" was they are so "slippery" that for someone like me who changes position while sleeping, I would get all twisted around in it! But I liked the feel of it, and would not hesitate recommending it for mild/warm weather camping.
customer_reviews.author: Rdurof

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not water proof. I was able to stuff the bag into the compression sack and the buckles disintegrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Mama

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Breaks after the first use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my daughter for the first time this weekend. I took her camping. After the second night the zipper broke. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: cspectorx

customer_reviews.title: Just received and will update
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this sleeping bag along with a tent to camp out tonight in the backyard and do something different. The sleeping bag arrived today morning with fast shipping. The sleeping bag will come tonight so these guys shipped really fast. The packaging was good. Product is really nice as it is lightweight, comfy and looking forward to using it. In addition, the owners sent a personalized note ahead of time with an estimated delivery time as well care instructions. Thanks. We tried it. It was comfy and warm. No issues with the product. Easy to fold back and store.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: First Impression
customer_reviews.text: I have not taken the sleeping bag out of the packaging yet, but the pink is a beautiful color. It's definitely light weight. I'm concerned it may be too thin. I'll add more to my comment when I open the bag and use it. REVALCAMP appears to care about customer service. They sent an email with care instructions and a follow-up email after the sleeping bag arrived; I like this. Down part, the sleeping bag is manufactured in China (I don't like this).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for How I Used Them
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I did not use this sleeping bag on a camping trip. My great-niece and great-nephew (ages 5 and 7) were coming for a visit, and I needed sleeping bags for them. I didn't want to spend a lot of money, and the kids were going to be sleeping indoors. The bags worked great for that! And they pack back in their bag very nicely. I was happy with this purchase--they did exactly what I needed them to do.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Arrived New But Padding Material Bunched Up
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag arrived with the padding material bunched up in several areas. It was this way straight out of the box it arrived in. I have read that you can’t wash this sleeping bag because this will happen but didn’t think it would arrive this way. The top edges are just two layers of thin fabric with absolutely no padding material between them. A single blanket would provide more warmth and cushioning than this!
customer_reviews.author: Colts Fan

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Be Machine Washed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these bags one year ago for our grandchildren who stay over. They were used very infrequently but eventually I decided to wash two of the bags. I washed on the cold delicate cycle as directed and line dryed. Upon doing so, the inside lining became completely displaced and balled up in certain areas throughout the bag, making them virtually unusable. So buyer beware. Great price, good looking BUT a dismal failure upon washing.
customer_reviews.author: Sally L.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great, lightweight sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I love it! here, in the NorthEast, winter tends to be cold and damp. And heating bills can run through the roof! That being said, I'm a cheap bastard and I keep the house just warm enough so the water pipes don't freeze. And that's where this sleeping bag comes in! Lightweight and warm into the mid 30's, it works! and I would recommend it to anyone looking to stay warm at night
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product, Great Value, Easy Communication with seller!
customer_reviews.text: Five sleeping bags were purchased for Christmas gifts for grandchildren. We love the quality, and we didn't want "kiddie" bags because we want them to be able to use them for years. Color selection was great, and I had one issue with what I assumed was a missing carrying/storage bag, but it was rolled inside the sleeping bag itself, and one quick email to the seller resolved the question within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: bevdeck

customer_reviews.title: Straps Broke on First Use
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited about this purchase because it would turn into a back pack with the straps. We carried the sleeping bag from our house to the car, and before we got to the car BOTH strap brackets (which are made of black plastic) broke. Not like a fixable broken, but a shatter and fall apart broken. The sleeping bag is decent, but if you are buying for the convenience of the straps then chose something else!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Powell

customer_reviews.title: Storage bag is low quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids (4 &7). The sleeping bags are nice, light weight and seem warm. The storage bag that comes with it is cheap. The sleeping bag doesn't fit in it and the harder you try to stuff the sleeping bag in it the more the seams rip and the strap buckles broke when I was tightening the bag (once I finally got the sleeping bag in the storage bag). Very low quality storage bag and my kids nor their grandparent's would ever be able to stuff the sleeping bag in the storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for sleep overs
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lime green and a pink camouflage sleeping bag for my nieces for Christmas. They aren’t bulky at all. They have their own bag to slip the sleeping bags in. I don’t know how warm they would be for outside, winter temperature S but for sleep overs or camping trips in Texas, it would work well. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Pink Military Cameo..... Me all day :)
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this bag yet. Will be this weekend and will update my reviews. At first sight I ordered the pink camouflaged one and it looks better in person. My daughter and I were so excited because it's both of her favorite colors... Pink and purple. We are a Military family so this was Perfect for my PRINCESS. Update to follow. UPDATE we did use this sleeping bag and use it all year long for sleep overs and camping in the woods. We love em
customer_reviews.author: PICSBRG

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer tent camping....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bags for a great-nephew's birthday, one for him and one for his brother. They are new to tent camping, but LOVE the tent, the bags and the experience. Reports from their parents: bags should hold up well and they are warm enough for summer tenting at the beach or in the back yard. No extra blankets required. They both got the blue bags since that color was the least expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Coast Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sleeping Bag for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of four that I ordered for the grandchildren. We will use these on the bunks of our RV for convenience and ease of setup. -They are priced well, so ordering multiples didn't break the bank. -The size seems about right for a child or small adult. -I like the fact there were several color options so I could get something different for each child. -They store nicely in an included stuff sack. I wish the sack was slightly larger for packing and storing the bag. It can be a challenge. Overall, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: n2shoebiz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four of these sleeping bags for our grandchildren to use inside our camper trailer. I selected these bags because they were one of the few on the market that are not treated with flame retardant chemicals. While we have not yet had the opportunity to use then, I am extremely pleased with the quality and construction of these bags. For the price point, they exceeded my expectations in quality and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DeGrenier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sleeping Bag!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a bag for a school outdoor education event. This bag was awesome, it's super soft and squishes up to fit into the carrying bag. It washed super easily and I hung it dry before rolling it back up. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: ajb76

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to see that the product quality (for the price point) was better than expected. I really like the stuff sack that comes with it too; especially the cinch down feature to save space. Got this for my 7 year old for camping. I like the color options but it would be nicer to have more graphic options other than marijuana leaves (*eye roll*), one city scape, and a phone booth. Something for kids or multi-color options would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it is OK if you don’t want to ever wash it
customer_reviews.text: With Covid right now, I purchased this to travel home. I put it in the washer so that it would be ready to go and it was unuseable after. The fiberfill was a mass of lumps everywhere. What a waste of money, and now I need to find another solution for my travel. Seriously disappointed. And stressed thanks to its poor construction.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a kids birthday and it is better then the price suggested. We are avid campers and use much more expensive set up and honestly, if I would have saw this before buying the other I woulda opted for this. I'm not saying it's as good or better then the good stuff but I am saying it's close enough!
customer_reviews.author: Aric S.

customer_reviews.title: Outdoors-Ordered two
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them yet, but we will soon! Color is great, had to make sure my hubby could fit into his. He is a tall man, so he did. We didn't want anything bulky, and we wanted great storage from them. The sleeve cover that came with it was very handy. Price was at a great price and I'm pretty sure, they will work out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after a ton of research and so far so good! Initially I was concerned about size, but it is perfect for kids and adults. Additionally - it folds up so small - I love it! And it is a great color. Amazing Product and Amazing Price - very pleased with this purchase. Warm and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Bunkley

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids to sleep on/in while we were on vacation. The color is great, it is lightweight yet warm and they wash well (on delicate and air dry no heat). I was surprised at how compact the sleeping bag rolls up, although it does take a little work to get it in the carrying bag. I would definitely recommend this sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how thin and flimsy this bag was. After just one use, the seams came apart, too. You barely move and you get all twisted up. Okay if you need light and compact for backpacking, but for normal use, no thanks. Had to return all 4 that I bought for my grandkids for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: myra

customer_reviews.title: Can zip 2 bags together for a warm double sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I loved the comfort of this sleeping bag- we ordered 2 red and zipped them together to make a big double size sleeping bag! The compression bag is great; it makes it lightweight and easy to carry. Much thicker and warmer than I expected and the color is fresh to death. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag was for my daughter and on first impression she loved the pink color very bright. The comfort level was very soft for her and she loved how warm it was. The bag was easy to store and doesn't take up that much space when stored very compact. Most likely will buy from this company again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: pinky4squishy

customer_reviews.title: First impression: Great value and design.
customer_reviews.text: Far higher-quality than I expected for the price! It arrived promptly and was well-lofted. It’s not an ultralight bag for hiking or bikepacking, but it’s a great size for car camping or sleepovers. Maybe my hopes are too high, but this should be a wonderful entry-level sleeping bag for getting the rest of my family as excited about camping as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Metal Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a “it’s summer!” gift for my 6 and 8 year old grand kids. It is a perfect replacement for their cutesy animal sleeping bags! Light weight, colorful and fun and easy to push in and store in the enclosed bag, the kids loved it! My 8 year old thought it was perfect to use every night so he wouldn’t have to make his bed in the morning! I’m impressed by the company and their follow up after purchase on my satisfaction! Great washable, soft and colorful sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and rips easily
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was able to use her sleeping bag one time before it ripped in multiple places on the outside cover.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleepin Bag so Far 💕
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's field trip. She has tested it out on our living room floor already!! She absolutely LOVES the Pink Camo!! Thank you. She is so excited to use it 😃
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: awesome sleeping bag for my son
customer_reviews.text: awesome sleeping bag for my son, compact and comfortable. He will be able to use for a few years and by then I will definitely purchase from RevelCamp. Looking for one for my daughter now to surprise her for her birthed so they can have a movie night in the living room all decked out in these sleeping bags! Awesome purchase! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ma.miamibeach

customer_reviews.title: Son LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yo to take to camp for the week. He first tried it out at a sleep over and said he LOVED it. He said it was so easy to put away, which was one of the reasons I bought it! He said it was comfy too. I hate rolling up sleeping bags and trying to stuff them back in their bags but this one is so easy to put away, I'm thinking of getting one for all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight.  Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a "case" to hold a foam mattress. I use it as a bed on the floor when I need some relief from lower back pain. The flat surface of the floor helps with that but it can get pretty uncomfortable after a couple of days. This sleeping bag holds the foam perfectly and is still lightweight enough to set aside when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: HOS 61

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We used these in Colorado last week in an air conditioned bunk house and loved them! We kept the ac set on 70 degrees and it was constantly around 62 degrees outside and they kept us plenty warm. They are thin but warm. I especially love that they are compact when in their bag, about the size of a basketball!!!! We had limited room when traveling and the four we took didn’t take up much room at all! However, they are slick and you do slip and twist around in them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Feel, Great Color, Niece Loved It
customer_reviews.text: This was what my niece requested for her birthday for her first slumber party birthday, and it was exactly what she wanted. It was comfy, and the color was great. A little pricey I thought for a sleeping bag, but it appeared good quality, so that was good. Would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ritz-Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great value - Superior customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and a great price. Can’t complain. Both my boys love the roominess. They wash well too. If you have any issues (we had a minor one), contact customer service. They will get back in less than 24 hours. They stand behind their product 100%. They will correct any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Ok sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Cute sleeping bags and great price. I will say they are a little thin and the stuffing bunches even when washed according to manufacturers directions. I prob wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RPH

customer_reviews.title: Great for my teen!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my teenage daughter. She loves it! It packs up so nicely and is easy to take with her to sleepovers and on camping trips. It's the perfect weight for sleepovers or summer camp - she's not backpacking in the mountains or anything. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: MichiganGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive buy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the price and quality. We are newbie campers and used it in about mid 50 degree weather. I used with an additional blanket (which I already planned on) to stay warm and did so comfortably. The sleeping bag is light weight, but did it's job. For the occasional camper, or camping in warmer weather I highly recommend this bag. Those that run cold or when camping in below 50 degree weather should probably consider additional blankets or lower temp. rated bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old loves this bag
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for a few months now and have washed it a few times as well and it has held up great! I live that there is a velcro closure over the zipper so when it is zipped up all the way it is secured so it doesn't get caught in your hair or scratch you. We bought the purple/magenta-ish color and it is a spot on match to the description. It is a well made bag that I am sure we will enjoy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer camp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my boys going to summer camp. They were lightweight and they used them on their bunks. They thought they were soft and comfy. They came with a carrying sack and needed a little help rolling it and getting it into the sack. They love the colors. I got a olive one and a blue one. Good quality, well stitched. I would buy these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: good basic sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent basic sleeping bag for a backyard campout with my kids. The color is vibrant. It's on the thinner side, so definitely not for winter or very cold camping days, but perfect for cooler summer nights. The outer layer wrinkles very easy. It came with a nice duffel type bag to keep it rolled up in.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Endings Homestead

customer_reviews.title: Not the best construction. After 2-3 washes all the padding came ...
customer_reviews.text: Rated for living room or HOT summer use. Not the best construction. After 2-3 washes all the padding came loose and got bunched to one side. Sticking was pretty weak.
customer_reviews.author: George Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant violet color but the buckle for one of the compression straps broke the first time I tried to pack it, so pretty useless. I need a sleeping bag that packs down small as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ArsenicandNewLace

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Sleeping Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this sleeping bag as the top layer on my bed. My dogs are constantly jumping up and down on the bed and sleep with me so this bag gets a Lot of use and we all Love it! It's super comfortable and durable plus was a great price! I got a black one to match my bedding but next I'm going to get a bright green and a blue one. Many thanks for such a great, affordable product. 4 Paws UP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for my kids. These sleeping bags are thin, but the color is fantastic. My 8yo used it once and broke the zipper. My 10yo is almost too big for it. I would say these are a "Wal-Mart" quality sleeping bag. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hillarie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to Australia to study for 4 weeks of backpacking and interacting with wild life. We wanted a really light sleeping back that she can fit on her luggage and carry around as they move from site to site. This on was perfect. We haven't test how warm may be at night but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: LXF

product_meta.title: REVALCAMP Sleeping Bag Indoor & Outdoor Use. Great for Kids, Boys, Girls, Teens & Adults. Ultralight and Compact Bags are Perfect for Hiking, Backpacking & Camping
feature_bullets: ⚡⚡⚡ TODAY's SPECIAL - get it for $22.97 - normally $28.50

✅ ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT AND EASY TO PACK - these sleeping bags pack down into an ultra compact bag in seconds. There’s no need to fold or roll it. Just stuff it into the sturdy carrying bag, pull the straps, and it folds down into a small, light TWO POUND package that will easily fit in any backpack.

✅ ROOMY AND COMFORTABLE - at 30 x 71 inches, these sleeping bags are incredibly roomy for any adult or child under 6’1. It’s easy to get in, get out and turn around to find a comfortable sleeping position. The zipper stays closed, and the plush filling means you’ll sleep like a baby.

✅ COLORS AND DESIGNS FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY - with 23 bright, vibrant colors and designs to choose from, every member of your family will find a sleeping bag they love. And mom and dad can even zip up two bags to create one large super snuggly double sleeping bag.

✅ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - we strongly stand behind the great craftsmanship of these sleeping bags. If you aren’t satisfied with the comfort, the size, the weight or for any reason at all then just let us know and we’ll be happy to give you a full refund – no hassles, no delays, no questions asked.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
